1.content:
We must decide who will receive the wand, but first we should cover some rules.

The Rules of the Wand:
1. The wand demands it be used, very few people can hold it and not want to use it. Though the wand is not good or evil, it encourages the user's inner desires whether they desire curves, status, skills, or vengeance.
2. The wand will always leave the targets in the positions they were in. IE when swapping bodies, the bodies will move, not the person inhabiting it.
3. The wand can swap anything that can be defined as a trait, whether it be physical or mental. It can swap skin tones, body parts, articles of clothing, friends, and skills. The wand is capable of making multiple swaps at a time.
4. The wand will adjust clothing to fit the body it is swapped to, but only alters clothing when the clothing is the target of a swap.
5. The wand most often makes swaps so that only the holder will know, but because the wand knows the desires of the wielder of the wand intends to use it maliciously the wand will leave both the holder and the victim know of the swap, but the victim either not be able to say what happened to them, or people would not believe what they are saying. For Example, D.Va makes Mei upset, so Mei uses the wand to swap Roadhog's fat onto D.Va. Only D.Va and Mei know of the swap, Mei as the holder, and D.Va as the victim. As result of this swap D.Va's mech is adjusted for her new weight, D.Va knows that all of a sudden she is fat and can't admit it, Roadhog now has very little fat on his body so his huge, mech tossing muscles are exposed for the world to see.

Now that we know what this wand can do! Let's see who get's this wand!

1123.content:
Mercy was floating around Pharah at the Temple of Anubis when she saw an artifact become uncovered. After successfully defending the objective she investigated the strange artifact. It was a wand, she figured it was in a pot that had been shattered during the mission—Junkrat always had a way of breaking and scattering objects all over the place. The wand was rather simple, it looked like it was carved from a short branch, it's fat end fit well in her palm, for some reason just holding this object made her feel powerful. The wand had the faintest of etchings that she would have scanned for Winston to analyze. Mercy decided to pocket her find and try to keep it for herself until she found out why it seemed so powerful.
It became difficult for Mercy to concentrate during the mission debriefing. "This mission would not have been a success without Angela's healing, I know combat medics tend to be overlooked, but our Angela always does a superb job!" Soldier said, regaining Mercy's attention. "Now that we have thwarted Talon's attempt to bypass Helix's security, we must plan our next move. Dismissed." The team began to disperse. Mercy was among the first to get up and start to leave.
"Angela?" Pharah tried to get Mercy's attention "You alright? You've been fidgeting a lot since we got back, it's worrying."
"Oh, I had a good idea towards the beginning of the debriefing," Mercy lied, though she didn't know why. "I want to get to my lab and start working on it right away." Mercy said, starting to rush past Pharah. Mercy continued rushing towards her lab, she was almost there, she made a turn into the final corridor of her journey only to bump into D.Va, sending both of them to the ground.
"Are you alright Ange?" D.Va asked, having recovered faster than Mercy. She was already on her feet and offering Mercy a hand.
"Oh, yes my dear, but a better question is: are you okay?"
"Never better!" D.Va responded with a bit of a bounce.
"Oh, the joys of youth," Mercy began to reminisce, "If only I were your age." She began to trail off, only to be brought back to current times by a warmth in her pocket, where she had stored the wand. She felt a wave of relief flow over her, she had began to shrink a little bit, her breasts firming up and shrinking a bit, her skin regained the little elasticity that had been lost to age, her muscles became more defined as they de-aged. She felt amazing, but what she was seeing invoked terror in her. She D.Va age rapidly she watched D.Va grow a few inches, her breasts became larger, then gained a little sag, some wrinkles appeared on her face, and her figure gained a little bit of pudge, as she almost doubled in age. Mercy swore she saw D.Va make painful faces during her transformation, but as quickly as the changes happened, her face took on a warm smile.
"Well I'm glad we're both okay." D.Va said, her voice had taken on a more adult tone, "I'll be on my way, I'm sure you've something great to work on, honey." She continued, before turning around and continuing on her way. As D.Va walked away she noticed that D.Va's suit was pulled really tight against her body, straining to hold the curves she had just gained—not all of which were good curves—and the legs of her suit were tight on her calves, Mercy couldn't let her walk away, could she? Mercy didn't know what to do...

Her achievements in medicine had made her able to stay youthful despite soon approaching her forties, while D.Va’s last health check had revealed a diet largely consisting of Doritos and Nano Cola. Mercy credited D.Va’s slender form to a high metabolism and good genes, but it appeared it wouldn’t help much as she’d get older.

Mercy felt the wand warm up in her pocket followed by regaining a few of her inches and a cup-size from D.Va, and vice versa. The gamer hadn’t seemed to notice the change, so the wand could possibly have the power to alter others’ perception of reality. If so, it defied all science, but Mercy would find it out anyways. Maybe something subtle, but noticeable, before going full scale.

Who did she see next?

1123111112111.content:
After recovering from the vertigo of suddenly gaining almost 2 feet in height, everything looked much smaller. Looking down towards the floor, Mercy’s previously slim stomach had been inflated to impossible proportions. Her turtleneck had seemingly adjusted to her increased girth, as well as her skintight jeans. She had been quite proud of her ass, filling out her pants quite well, but she had nothing on Roadhog. Not because of curves, but rather his massive volume. The investigation of her new body was interrupted by Reinhardt, or rather the new inhabitant of his body.

“Hej, Angela. [Hello, Angela.]” Through all the years Mercy had known Reinhardt, she could count on one hand the amount of times she’d heard him speak in a normal volume. If she didn’t know better, she’d think it was her old German friend sitting in a comfy chair knitting a sweater.

“Who do you think will win?” Brigitte looked at Mercy.

“Who?” The doctor was still a bit dizzy from the swap.

“You know, Junkrat or Roadhog.” She pointed over at the ping pong table and Mercy did a double take as she looked at the changed junkers.

Roadhog was now the proud owner of Brigitte’s body, while Junkrat had the body of a Russian athlete capable of lifting half a metric ton. But despite having the body of the strongest woman alive, his technique was still miserable, so Roadhog had no trouble keeping up. What caught Mercy’s attention, however, was that like her and Brigitte, they also wore the same clothes as before the swap. In short, Brigitte was watching her own bare-chested body with nipple piercings seemingly playing against a still blonde Zarya with an open shirt, breasts jiggling like crazy.

“I don’t know, maybe Roadhog,” Mercy said.

Glancing over at the other end of the lounge, she could see her own body arm wrestling with Junkrat. Being a healer, she’d been focusing more on being a support than working muscle. That’s why she was honestly surprised when she saw that even in different bodies, none of them showed any sign of losing.

Minding her new weight, she made sure she sat down beside Brigitte in one of the chairs made for the heavier heroes. They talked for a while about this and that, until Reinhardt approached them, head hanging low.

“Brigitte, I have lost and sorely need currywurst.” It was weird hearing the Australian speak with a German accent.

“I guess we’ll have to break up our conversation now, Angela, he won’t shut up when he’s started begging for that fried pork of his.”

“Oh, that’s fine, I have things to attend to anyways.” Mercy was starting to get tired of Roadhog’s voice coming out whenever she spoke, so maybe it was time to swap everyone back to normal before Brigitte and Reinhardt left.

11231111121112.content:
Mercy looked around, but she couldn’t see anyone other than Brigitte, Reinhardt and her. She started worrying and asked the others, “Where did they go?”

“I don’t know where Zarya went,” Reinhardt said.

“And Junkrat and Roadhog left for like 10 minutes ago, but I think they said something about taking a withdrawal from a bank somewhere,” Brigitte answered.

This was terrible, the junkers could be away for several weeks Mercy knew them right. That would mean Brigitte and Zarya wouldn’t get their bodies back for a while. They luckily didn’t notice their switched bodies, but Mercy thought that she should fix at least one of the swaps. Moments later, at least Reinhardt was back in his proper body, and Brigitte was in Junkrat’s.

“See you later, Angela,” Brigitte said as she and Reinhardt went looking for food.

“See you too, Brigitte,” Mercy said with a frown. She hoped Zarya would come back with her body soon, but right now the only thing on her mind was getting out of Roadhog’s bloated one. She’d just swap with someone while waiting for Zarya, and she’d make sure to pick someone she was certain would stay indoors.

112311111211123.content:
Mercy was used to her own lighter body, so trudging around as Roadhog was unusual and strange. She didn’t care who, she was going to swap with the first person she saw. As she walked down the corridor, she could hear sounds of buttons being pressed, accompanied by near-silent chuckle. Passing an open door, she discovered Sombra trying to hack into the system. The wand did its work, and as Mercy closed her eyes for a moment, she heard Roadhog’s voice say, “Always leave yourself a back door,” in a Mexican accent. The next moment, the now obese spy from Talon had made her escape with her translocator.

“Well, at least I’m not fat anymore,” Mercy said with a sigh. Instead she was 3” shorter and 7 years younger than her original body.

She had stolen Zarya's hair, then lost her and Brigitte's body to the junkers, who had disappeared to God knows where. Her own body was gone, and Brigitte was stuck in Junkrat's. The chances of encountering Sombra in Roadhog’s body were close to none, and Mercy’s current ethnicity was hispanic. This should’ve caused her some panic and stress, but she was running out of fucks to give. As long as nobody got hurt, well, nobody she knew, things should work out fine. After all, she was the only one aware of the changes.

Something she'd noticed with the last few swaps, was that they started to turn her on. She hoped she hadn’t had a boner as Roadhog, but at least Brigitte hadn’t mentioned it even if she noticed. It was easier hiding arousal with a female body, either that or wearing baggy pants. As she was nearing the kitchen, wandering about without any plan other than performing more swapping, she could hear someone approaching rapidly behind her.

“Thanks, Angela, I’ll have Winston run diagnostics on the core database.” As he walked back towards the lab, she noticed that his hips swayed a tiny bit.

Roadhog rapidly shed his weight becoming a very gaunt skeletal figure, this scared the practiced physician as there is no way that Roadhog was in a healthy state, not that he was before, but it was miraculous that he could even maintain a sitting position. He looked like a Halloween skeleton with an airbrushed on skin, Mercy barely noticed that his clothes remained in tact and fit him perfectly. Junkrat had become a meatball, as his weight gained his prosthetic leg slipped off the table's edge as he proclaimed his genius, this roused Roadhog's deep chortle, and silenced the cafeteria as everyone gawked at the scene. Junkrat was quickly back up and opted to ignore his recent encounter with the floor. Angela saw that even with his extra couple hundred pounds he seemed to maintain the same attitude and stamina, as well as his clothes.
The two junkers were returned to their original weights before anything more could happen. More notes were jotted down, and the next swap was decided upon. Mercy wanted to try to swap a more general trait, she targeted Junkrat and Tracer again. Angela saw Junkrat shrink an inch or two, his skin soften and watched as breasts formed under his harness that he wore his suicide grenades on. His harness seemed to changed a little too, it covered his chest much more, though she supposed that could have been on account of Junkrat's smaller stature.
Angela had also watched Lena increase in height, her shoulders broadening, she watched Lena's hourglass waist flatten into a masculine V shape, she witnessed a grand feminine butt become an equivalent masculine butt, it awakened feelings within Angela, she considered attempting to make a move on the now young man, but she still had questions to answer and pried her eyes from the tempting flesh displayed in a similar yellow material, though it seemed thicker than the spandex it was before, looking up she noticed that Lena's aviater jacket no longer had the same cut, it's bottom hem was not straight, it had a white fleece now trimmed the bottom, and her collar was no longer popped, it laid flat, also with the same trimming the bottom had had. Lena's Chrono-accelerator harness had faded through the jacket as Male Lena wore it under his jacket. Angela noted how Junkrat's style hadn't changed while Lena's had rather significantly.
Mercy now examined Lena as he sat next to Emily, they now sat further apart, they didn't look at each other the same way as they had before, well, Lena looked at her with longing, but Emily was not receptive. The wand activated, Angela was shocked by the wand's activation but quickly saw that Emily and Lena were now sat closer and shared a longing gaze. The wand had swapped Emily's sexuality, Angela had been considering doing this, but hadn't made the wish. Mercy frantically looked around, trying to figure out who's sexuality Emily had received.
112312431121.title: Mercy decides to begin testing in the cafeteria.

1123124311215.content:
Angela's brow furrowed as she slowly scanned the room. It was practically impossible to tell just who might have been the swapee in this situation. No one else was with their loved one at the moment. She glanced towards Soldier 76, trying to see if any behavior of his had changed, but he was as stoic on that front as ever. Looking for other candidates for possible change wasn't bound to help either.

What women were present weren't acting any differently, at least for the moment. Pharah sat next to soldier, eating and chatting, though the conversation tended to one side. Her mother Ana did much the same. Twisting somewhat so that she could check the other half of the room, Mercy found that Mei and Symmetra were also engaging in a fairly usual banter, though Mei did seem a bit less enthused thanks to having Jack's sense of engagement.

Angela was about to start looking again, before her gaze paused on Symmetra. Something in her brain seemed to kick into gear as she slowly slid her eyes down the woman's legs, and then back up to admire her dark mane of hair. The final leg of her search was far less thorough. She barely even looked in Brigette's direction to check on her, eyes constantly drifting back to Symmetra.

Finally deciding that she would have to determine who was switched later, she opted to...
1123124311215.title: A Personal Donation

11231243112151.content:
A maniacal giggle tore Angela’s gaze from the corner of the room, Junkrat and Roadhog had apparently finished their plans and were rising from their seats. Alarmed that Junkrat would get away with Leena’s gender, she gave the wand a small flick and the australian suddenly lost his hourglass waist. At the same time Leena shrunk by a few inches in her seat and her proportions settled back to feminine curves. Angela hardly saw the two junkers leave as she slowly inspected Tracer to ensure everything was exactly where it was supposed to be. After an internal debate she decided that her teammate had most certainly lost some definition in her generous rear.

Mercy’s careful inspection was cut short as she noticed Pharah walk into the cafeteria, the two locked eyes for a moment before Angela shifted her gaze away with a blush. She had never admitted it to Pharah personally, but Mercy had the slightest of girl crushes on her. Maybe that was a bit of an understatement she thought, as her gaze followed Pharah’s rear to the cafeteria’s counter. Pharah spent nearly every hour she had off in the rec center and it showed. Her defined curves filled out the spandex of her leggings well, which naturally drew the eyes upwards. Leena wasn’t the only girl in Overwatch who was packing, if anyone could challenge her for Best Bottom it would be Pharah.

As Angela’s thoughts strayed to the more intimate, the swap wand in her pocket activated. With a startled look she quickly scanned the room. Tracer and Emily sat a little farther away from each other but maybe that was just her panicked mind. Ashe and Brigitte were still conversing as normal and so were Mei, Soldier and Symmetra in the corner. Pharah was finished picking out her breakfast and was walking away from the main counter, nothing looked out of place on her, in fact her sports bra and exposed midriff looked very… right.

Mercy had little time to think before…
11231243112151.title: New Interests

choices: The story follows Mercy and Pharah.
112312431121511.content:
Mercy smiled warmly as Pharah approached her table, trying her best not to stare at the woman’s chest. “Angela, feeling better today?” asked Pharah as she sat down. “You were worrying me at the debriefing yesterday…” Mercy was reminded of the day before; she’d been up for at least a full day now. During the debrief Fareeha had been concerned for Mercy. She must have noticed her excitement for the wand and mistook it for nerves. “Oh yes I’m feeling much better, I was just tired is all”. The wand should be kept secret for now thought Mercy, at least until she could fully understand its power. “And you didn’t spend the night in your lab? You look like you haven’t slept a wink”. At this Pharah placed her hand reassuringly over Mercy’s own. Angela intended to look Fareeha in the eye to convince her otherwise, but the egyptian’s gaze stole her breath away. Even though Pharah had just done up the basics before her workout she looked as beautiful as ever. The sun coming from the nearby windows streamed through her coal black hair. Golden beads twinkling as she tilted her head in concern; they helped draw an inquisitive eye past her neckline and to her--

“Angela?”

“Oh, I- Fareeha I’m fine, I’ll take a nap after breakfast and be right as rain…” If Mercy was being completely honest with herself, she’d need more than just a nap. Pharah spoke again but Angela didn’t quite hear. She had once again started fantasizing; silently admiring her teammates… assets. Maybe if she was a bit bigger… Mercy’s steamy thoughts were cut short by a warmth in her pocket. She hadn’t even been touching the wand this time, great gods what did it do this time?? It didn’t take long for her to find out exactly what the wand had done; as Fareeha’s sports bra shifted and expanded, in order to accommodate her rapidly growing breasts. Angela watched intently as her crushes’ boobs grew enough to sag downwards despite her sports bras support. Frustratingly the cut of her undergarment slowly morphed to hide the most of Pharah’s expansive cleavage. The growth stopped short of grapefruit size- Mercy was sure of it; she’d seen Mei walking out of the shower enough… times…

“Well Angela?” Mercy’s train of thought was once again stopped short, this was starting to become a theme. “Sorry what?” she replied. “I said you should take that nap soon; Reinhardt mentioned another mission tonight at the debrief”. The doctor sighed; she should really get out of here before she accidently swapped something again; sleep deprivation must make the impulse harder to control. Mercy interrupted her pause by replying, “You’re right Fareeha I’ll go right now in that case”. Mercy took the opportunity to scan the room as she rose from her seat, her fears instantly confirmed. Mei was getting up to leave too but the change was obvious, her outfit now clung even tighter to her chest. It appeared that in this reality she was at least 2 cup sizes smaller. Mercy considered swapping Pharah back, she even reached for the wand… Yet as her teammate rose from her seat, the resulting tectonic shift of her breasts stopped her. She’d get to putting everyone back to normal after her rest.

Pharah interrupted her train of thought again as they put their dishes away; “Good, I’ll tag along, I need to get a few more reps in the rec room anyway”. “Oh, you don’t have to Fareeha plea- “

Pharah moved in close to Mercy, placing a hand on her shoulder. The Egyptian was so close Angela could smell the spicy odor blocker Pharah liked, she even picked up the after notes of a good workout. Mercy inhaled slowly before looking upwards into her teammate’s eyes. “Angela, I insist, I worry about you sometimes; always stuck in your lab. When was the last time you had dinner with everyone?”. “I- sometimes I get carried away with a new discovery… and you know how busy a doctor’s schedule is”. Pharah pulled away slowly, and the pair began moving towards the exit; “Don’t you think you should care for your own health first and foremost?” she questioned.

Mercy was deep in thought as she led the way to the dormitory; failing to notice just how far Emily and Leena were sitting apart from one another. Their conversation stopped short, instead the pair sat staring at their phones.
112312431121511.title: A Bonding Moment

1123124311215111.content:
---Pharah---

The halls leading to the dormitory were empty as Pharah walked beside Mercy; most of the team must have slept in today. Before the two reached Angela’s room the doctor halted, bracing herself against the wall. “Angela, what’s the matter?” Pharah moved in close to her friend, placing a hand on her shoulder. “I’m fine Fareeha, it’s just a dizzy spell; I must be more tired than I thought”. Pharah reflected inwardly as the pair continued onwards. She hated seeing her friend like this; It seemed the years were beginning to take their toll. Pharah herself had begun to feel the effects; and although she wasn’t sure, Mercy was certainly several years older. Of course, that didn’t stop the older woman from acting as though she was still in the cadets. Always putting herself at risk before others, never a care for her own health. Pharah was much the same, and this similarity helped forge a strong bond between the two. Though she had never admitted it to anyone, Pharah hoped that that bond might grow into something more someday.

It was slow going, but the pair finally reached Mercy’s room. Before she was even through the door, Angela let her lab coat slide to the ground. Pharah followed her friend in, stopping to place the garment on a nearby hook. “I’ll make sure that no one disturbs you Angela, have a good rest”. Mercy fell face first onto her mattress, replying with a muffled thank you. As Pharah turned to leave she noticed something strange, a small stick was laying where Mercy had dropped her coat. Intending to place it back where it belonged, she picked it up and immediately felt something within her. A swelling crescendo of strength and vitality filled her chest and spread throughout her body. Pharah had never seen anything like it in Mercy’s lab before. Upon closer inspection it reminded her of a wand; carved out of wood, it started at a fat base and tapered to a blunt point. Pharah was torn, she had never invaded Angela’s privacy before, but this wand felt too important to just ignore. Was this why Angela hadn’t slept last night?

Does Pharah leave the wand where it belongs? Or try to understand its nature more…
1123124311215111.title: The story follows Mercy and Pharah.

11231243112151111.content:
Pharah stared at the wand for a reasonable amount of time, turning it over in her hand. It certainly didn't look like anything she had ever seen in Angela's lab. If anything, it appeared to be pulled straight from a children's story book. That said, it was not unlike Angela to have a flair for the fantastical. The woman flew around with angel wings strapped to her back out on the battlefield.

"Ah..." Pharah murmured to herself, finally feeling that she understood. The energy she felt upon picking the item up said it all. This was surely one of Angela's new experiments, meant to give someone a little pick-me-up. Perhaps even an upgrade to her usual healing staff. "Well in that case," she said, pausing to give Mercy a short look, "I suppose holding onto it would help Angela get better results."

All doubt erased from her mind, she pocketed the item and continued down the hall to the rec room. While certainly not buzzing with activity, it hadn't fully emptied out just yet. Off in one corner she saw Reinhardt hoisting up a gigantic barbell as Brigette stood off to the side, counting off. Every now and then she took a bite out of the sandwich she had taken with her from the cafeteria.

Pharah decided to settle in at one of the machines next to Zarya, and set it for a weight just above her usual. There was no point trying to compete with the weightlifter herself, but she didn't want to come off as too puny. It wasn't long until she was breaking a sweat yet again, having already stopped by the room once today. Stopping to take a breath, she stole a glance at Zarya's settings, noting that they were easily twice what she was doing, and the pink haired woman wasn't even breaking a sweat.

Pharah could only shake her head in amusement, reaching over to give Zarya a friendly slap on the shoulder. "I wish I were you sometimes, Zarya, or that I could lift so much."

Zarya gave her a wry grin, punching Pharah's shoulder in return. "Give it some time and dedication, and maybe you'll get..." She jokingly 'thought' for a moment, "Halfway to my record."

The pair of them laughed as Pharah felt a warmth in her pocket. Looking down, she spied the wand glimmering, and looked up just in time to see it working its magic. Suddenly Pharah...
11231243112151111.title: Field Tests

112312431121511111.content:
“Like I said, I wish I could lift as much as you”. Said Zarya, as her own muscles began to shrink. At the same time, Pharah experienced the opposite, muscle mass flowing from nowhere into her body. The Egyptian’s perspective shifted as she gained half a foot in height, in seconds Pharah now had to look down at her teammate as they seamlessly switched physiques.

“What…” Pharah was in disbelief as Zarya turned back to her bench as though nothing was amiss.

“Oh, did I misspeak?” Asked the Russian. “English confuses me, I meant to say that I am jealous of you, only kidding of course.” She laughed at that, before resuming her workout. Only now the weight she had on was twice as much as she could ever hope to lift. Mumbling in Russian, Zarya removed some weight to a lower amount. All the while Pharah silently stared, mouth agape at what had just occurred. Her comrade had just lost fifty pounds of pure muscle and didn’t care, or for that matter even notice.

Almost subconsciously Pharah went back to her reps, her mind a haze of questions and few answers. Of course, now her workout was laughably easy; she marveled at how she could effortlessly workout with 400lbs of weight on. Within 5 minutes of this, she hadn’t even broken a sweat, while her now much smaller companion was grunting with exertion. Pharah soon found herself idly admiring Zarya, while trying her best not to be too obvious. Zarya had seemingly chosen to wear as little as possible for her work out; in fact, her attire also seemed to have been transformed to fit her new mass. Her form-fitting top would have looked ridiculous on her had it not shrunk to fit her less massive frame. Indeed, Zarya’s Adidas leggings had also shrunk; although to Pharah’s eye, they were even tighter than before. A blush tinted Pharah’s cheeks as she continued to inspect her friend. It was hard to tell at first but when Zarya moved to get more comfortable; the positively massive camel toe she was sporting became more than obvious. A flirty joke suddenly crossed Pharah’s mind, I’d love to lift her instead of this bar.

With growing horror, she registered a searing heat in her pocket; tearing her gaze away, she began to see the artifact glowing through the fabric of her pants.

“Well Pharah, what are you waiting for?” Asked Zarya, only now her voice came from directly behind. Startled, Pharah whipped back around to see that now in place of her weight bar was indeed Zarya, lying across an enlarged holder. Where the Russian had last been was the old bar, sitting on the bench forgotten. Does Pharah…
112312431121511111.title: Accidental Experimentation

1123124311215111112.content:
Pharah's eyes shot between the Russian now occupying the space behind her and the seat she previously occupied, where now sat an iron bar. In an increasingly manic manner, she couldn't stop looking between the two, trying to process just what exactly the wand had done. Was Zarya a weight lifting bar now? A human bar? She peered at the machine where the bar now 'sat', noticing that it still had settings for weight registered on it. Was the bar...Lifting weights?

"Pharah?"

Zarya's voice brought her out of her stupor. Looking back up at Zarya again, something finally clicked in Pharah's brain. Or broke. She let out a blood curdling scream, as she suddenly realized the situation her desires had set up, stumbling forward away from the bench. She went much faster than expected, hurled forward by her stolen girth. Pharah managed to stop herself just a few inches from the wall, which she could only assume would have been dented inward if she had actually made contact.

From her position above the bench, Zarya bent upward, mouth agape. "Are you...Are you okay?"

Pharah shook her head, looking once more at the bar. An idea formed, one that might fix this. "I was. I was just thinking." Her shaking finger pointed at the bar, "I was thinking how much I'd love to lift that bar."

She felt her thigh set ablaze once more as the wand did...Whatever it did. She looked down just in time to be blinded by a light. Upon looking up again, Zarya was still staring at her, except this time she was sitting at her machine as she had been before. There was no small amount of confusion as she spoke, glancing about to see if anyone else was as dumbfounded as her.

"Then...Then lift the bar, da?"

Pharah looked at the bench, letting out a relieved sigh as she found everything truly back in its place. Shakily standing up, she peered around the rec room, noticing that Reinhardt and Brigette both had stopped to stare at all of the commotion. Reinhardt had a giant barbell in each hand, one paused mid-rep as he watched Zarya and Pharah. Brigette mirrored him, except instead of a barbell, she was holding her sandwich halfway to her mouth, which stood agape waiting for a bite.

Pharah opted to...

First she accidentally swapped ages with D.Va, it felt amazing being so young again, though she felt she'd have to give D.Va's age back next time she saw her. At her computer she found that it was on her log in page, her desk was shuffle through, as if someone was looking for something—probably something with my password on it—the password entry field had a few black dots it, Sombra really had been just trying to guess my password. Angela asked sounding as hopeful as possible, she discreetly pulled the wand from her pocket just far enough to point at Sombra, and thought that she'd swap their skills of sneaky tactics, she was careful to maintain her sense of empathy though, it'd gotten her this far, it surely would help in addition to some sneaky tactics.
The world shimmered, Sombra's head fell back against the examination table. Angela immediately jumped to action, approaching her head and shoving the wand back into her pocket, she made a show of reaching her empty hand towards Sombra as she pocketed the wand—her sneaky tactics are already shining through, and working in conjunction with her empathy. "Are you alright?!" Angela asked urgently.
"Si, uhh, yea." Sombra responded, she had defaulted to her native tongue for a sec. "The mind control has really messed me up." She continued. Angela finally caught up with reality, this was no longer about cutting deals, she's looking at a girl who was brain washed and used by Tallon, the device in this reality was indeed a mind control device, Sombra was artificially sneaky thanks to the device, her whole attitude changed when the device was deactivated. Angela knew of the super hacker, but could only see a scared, confused child.
Angela removed the restraints, and held the girl, "Its alright now, they can't hurt you any more." Mercy said quietly into the girl's ear as she did so Sombra began crying into Mercy's shoulder. Angela rubbed Sombra's back as she thought about her actions, she safely eliminated a threat, no blood, no anger, no fear of backstabbing, just an echo of a former self, freed from that former self's wrong doings. Angela was proud of this, but on the fence about the morality of her actions. The temptation of messing with Sombra's traits was tempting though, as was the temptation of studying the wands effects on reality, her scientific mind knew that studying reality would likely be a fruitless effort though.
After calming Sombra down she tells her what she's going to do, and calls in Jack, Angela explains to Jack the mind controlling and recommends that she be given a room and receive frequent therapy. Jack begrudgingly complies, only because brain washing is something he's seen on the field, but does make it clear that Sombra will be closely monitored for a while, which Sombra is understanding of.
Jack goes to have the room prepared while Angela does a routine check up on Sombra. Sombra is as healthy as can be.
"Angela, she will be staying in the room next to yours, and across from mine." Soldier's voice come through the speaker next to the medical lab's door.
"There we go, you are almost all set." Angela begins happy to break up the medical talk, "Now, are you going to continue to go by Sombra?"
"Olivia, my name is Olivia." The woman says as if she were surprised by the revelation herself.
Angela begins to consider using the wand again...
112331342.title: The Wand of Safety

choices: She goes to her room for the night.
She goes to the common area to see who she could swap with.
She plots to bring Tallon down, one wand wave at a time.
She attempts to study and understand the wand.
1123313424.content:
Before Angela takes an action there is a knock at the door. "Just a sec, let me see who that is." Angela tells Sombra, and turns to the door and opens it part way.
"Hey, Angela, is everything alright?" It's D.Va, Angela notes that she has began to talk differently.
It was D.Va, Angela only now remembers her first swap, how she didn't even have time to feel bad for taking Hana's age, "Though it seems she's fine, maybe I'll just stay this way a little longer the extra energy will help me a lot, she can keep fighting with ease for at least another 20 years, specially when under my care." Mercy justified to herself in her head.
"We're alright, no need to worry." Angela replies, hoping she hadn't paused too long.
"You seem a little distant, are you sure?" D.Va really seemed to care, perhaps with her age and lack of children she's began to latch onto the younger members.
"I'm sure, now if you would please, I should get Olivia to her room." Angela said, dismissing the now older woman, mildly peeved that she was being treated like a child. She closed the door and approached Olivia, "I want to make sure your settled in before you start making contact with the rest of the members." The doctor told Olivia as she grabbed her laptop. "You ready to go?"
"Wait, do you think people will hate me?" Olivia said meekly, beginning to stand.
"No, the members won't hate you," Mercy began, "Well, not in the long run, they may not welcome you warmly immediately, but in time you'll be a cherished resident." Olivia nodded understanding.
Angela had just finished settled Olivia into her new room when there was a knock on the door, "It's me, Jack." came from the other side. Angela looked to Olivia, she showed a little fear, but looked back to Angela and nodded.
"Come in Jack." Mercy replied, taking Olivia's side and holding her arm. Jack opened the door and walked in, he looked around briefly before focusing on the girls.
"You settled in then?" Jack replied looking at Olivia.
"Yes." Olivia said.
"Good, now while we have reason to believe that you were indeed brainwashed, we will be careful about letting you stay. Your online interactions will be monitored as well as any calls you make, also, this door will be locked from 2200 to 0800." The old Soldier motioned towards the door. "You will remain in this room for those hours until further notice." Jack finished.
"Got it," Olivia said. Jack turned towards the door, "Thank you," Olivia almost shouted at the soldier's back. "Thank you for letting me stay." Olivia added as Jack turned back around.
"Don't thank me, if I had my way you'd be restrained, imprisoned, and most importantly still brainwashed. Angela did all the work, she's to thank." He turned around and left, "Night." He said before vanishing behind a closed door.
"Thank you." Olivia replied quietly, hugging the girl next to her. "I have my life back. Even if I live in this room for the rest of my life I'm grateful, I'm me again." She was again on the verge of tears, Angela rubbed her back, soothing the older woman.
"I'm sorry you had to deal with all you did," Angela whispered, "I recommend you take some time and think about what you want to do with your life. Now I have to go deal with some stuff around the base, so if you're ready I'll take my leave."
Olivia gave one final squeeze before releasing the smaller girl, "I'm alright, see you tomorrow."
"Night." Mercy said leaving the room. It was nearly 2200, she was glad to not have been locked in for the night. She only had the wand on her mind, she wanted to use it, but wasn't sure how, or rather who.
